text: “Aronɨn adarazir ofa gamir gumaziba, me igiamra ofa gamir ingangarim isir dughiamɨn ofan tam damigh. Egh me ofa gamir dughiamɨn gumazitam amɨseveghtɨ, a na bagh ofabar amu. A plauan tam inightɨ, an osɨmtɨzim 1 kilogremɨn tugh, a mati me dughiabar zurara wit tuer ofan ababanimra inigh. A plauan kamɨn akuatam isɨ mɨzarazimɨn ofa damigh, egh aruem magɨrɨtɨ, an akuar namɨn ofa damu.
